definition: line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: She also held positions in the television and motion-picture industries.
sentences.chinese: 此後，她從事新聞工作，還在電視和電影業工作過。

sentences.english: Children have an important role in Iranian cinema.
sentences.chinese: 兒童在伊朗電影業中扮演着重要角色。

sentences.english: They are all, you know, very popular. All the mainstay ones.
sentences.chinese: 它們全都非常出名，都是電影業的支柱。

sentences.english: Does that series really capture the movie business?
sentences.chinese: 那個系列真的記錄了電影業嗎？

sentences.english: The film industry in England is in an interesting situation.
sentences.chinese: 電影業在英國現在處於一個有趣的狀態。

sentences.english: But others are courageously optimistic about its ability to adapt.
sentences.chinese: 但對香港電影業適應力持積極樂觀態度者也不乏其人。

sentences.english: Overhaulin Chip Foose in CV … and offer these products to the TV, and individuals and the film industry and the automotive industry.
sentences.chinese: 這些產品提供給個人，電視和電影業和汽車製造商。

sentences.english: A multi-million pound boost for the British film industry.
sentences.chinese: 數百萬英鎊的注入以推動英國電影業的發展。

sentences.english: Jurors are respected, working artists in the film industry.
sentences.chinese: 評委會成員是電影業中受尊敬的在職藝術家。

sentences.english: I came to filmmaking in the early '80s, and it was a time of deep economic recession.
sentences.chinese: 80年代初期，經濟危機的底谷，我剛剛進入電影業。

sentences.english: Chinese film - making has in this course also begun its structural re - arrangement, and taken to the path of industrialization.
sentences.chinese: 同時，中國電影業開始結構調整，走上了產業化道路。

sentences.english: Do you think the world financial crisis from last year has affected the movie industry as well?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得去年開始的世界金融危機也影響到電影業了嗎？

sentences.english: The success of sound revolutionized the film industry.
sentences.chinese: 有聲片的成功給電影業帶來了一場革命。

sentences.english: How's the film industry in England at the moment?
sentences.chinese: 現在英國的電影業怎麼樣？

sentences.english: India's cinema business is also fiendishly complex for outsiders.
sentences.chinese: 印度的電影業對外來商來說也非常費解。

sentences.english: "This is a catastrophe for Iran's cinema, " he said.
sentences.chinese: “這對伊朗的電影業來說是大禍臨頭，”他說。

definition: theater chain (abbr. for 電影院線|电影院线)
to reveal outstanding talent (idiom); to stand out as conspicuously brilliant
head/director (of an organizational unit)/(police) commissioner/inspector-general/rank of local governor in Tang dynasty administration
